pledges.title: CUT DOWN ON YOUR FOOD WASTE
pledges.subtitle: Eat what you buy, don’t throw food away and start composting your food waste.
pledges.description: WHY THIS PLEDGE IS SO IMPORTANT

pledges.title: SWITCH TO A RE-USABLE BOTTLE, CUP AND CUTLERY WHEN YOU'RE ON THE GO
pledges.subtitle: Reduce single-use plastic waste when you’re out and about.
pledges.description: WHY THIS PLEDGE IS SO IMPORTANT

pledges.title: WASH CLOTHES AT 30 DEGREES OR BELOW AND DRY NATURALLY
pledges.subtitle: Change your washing habits to reduce your energy consumption. Don’t wash your clothes about 30 degrees and let them dry naturally rather than using a tumble drier.
pledges.description: WHY THIS PLEDGE IS SO IMPORTANT
